name: Text/General Layout
description: A general-purpose layout for displaying text-only information. Use this for summarizing simple documents, notes, or content without images. **This layout should be used as a default fallback when no other specialized layout is suitable.**
examples: Open the last memo I saved.
Show me the article I was reading this morning.

component_title.description: A brief title for the overall content block (e.g., 'Meeting Summary', 'Saved Note').

text_heading.description: The main headline or title of the text content.

text_description.description: The main body of the text, used for displaying the full summary, note, or article content.
text_description.example: The company entered digital health with new AI tools to support faster diagnostics and better patient care.

sample.text_description: The company entered digital health with new AI tools to support faster diagnostics and better patient care.

{{ data.text_heading }}
